title: quarkus cli should give hint that you can run with `-e` to get error info
body:
### Describe the bug

currently if you run `quarkus create app -x github-action` you get an error:

```
quarkus create app -x github-action xyzdkdk
-----------
selected extensions:
- io.quarkiverse.githubaction:quarkus-github-action

[ERROR] ‚ùó  Unable to create project: Error while rendering template: /codestarts/quarkus/quarkiverse-github-action-codestart/base/action.docker.tpl.qute.yml
```

not a lot of help.

Took me a while to remember `-e` existed.

so it would be great if that error message would have  a hint like:

`Run with `-e` to get stacktraces and/or `--verbose` for more detailed logging`
